subsection.name: Windows Installer
subsection.p: Scriptom is included as part of the Groovy Windows Installer - a "one-click" setup for Groovy on Windows. Install the latest version, and you can start writing scripts that include COM-automation immediately.

subsection.name: Download
subsection.p: If you are looking for a complete, pre-packaged distribution of Scriptom, you can download the scriptom-all-assembly ZIP file. This includes the Scriptom JAR, the JACOB JAR and its DLLs, the complete set of type library JARs, and supplemental information. It does not include Groovy and its dependencies (since Scriptom can run on different versions of Groovy).
